name: Adventurers of Otium
description: Adventurering is dangerous. Hire someone else to do it for you!
author: James Hurburgh

bugfixes: Fixed bug where all loot was mysterious scrolls

features: Items are now obtainable through missions
Items can be sold for their value
Tabs!  Everything is in tabs now.
bugfixes: Statistic filter is now case insensitive
Initial load now sets game version

features: Split up automation options and displayed better in dialog.
Removed recalculating stuff all the time.
Statistic table can now be filtered in modal view.
Merged coins and renown in bottom bar so preserve space
bugfixes: Fixed layout bug to stopped relocate buttons from being accessible.
Fixed top and bottom of content being cut off

features: Added more adventurers for the tavern.
Added more contracts for the tavern.
Updated hired adventurers to a table for readability.
Added footer and moved coins and reknown there.

versions.description: The UI update.  Put everything in places that hopefully make a little more sense.
features: UI updated with a proper nav bar and everything.
Hire all and start all contracts.
Major layout adjustments to make the game more mobile friendly.
Added coin counter just above adventurers for hire.
Contracts now show risk, reward and duration factors

versions.description: Upgrades to expeditions to show more details.
features: Show all adventurers and statuses on completed quest cards

versions.description: Initial versioned release!  Versioning and save game loading improved.
bugfixes: Rejigged saved game loading.  Should work better now.
